ua.khpi.hrynevych.task04.subtask02

Class Subtask02

  • java.lang.Object
    • ua.khpi.hrynevych.task04.subtask02.Subtask02

  • public final class Subtask02
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains methods for filling the file with the array of integers and sorting array from the specified file.
    Version:
    1.0, 30 Nov 2017
    Author:
    Hrynevych Pavlo

      • getRandomNumbers

        public static void getRandomNumbers(java.lang.String rawFile,
                                    int number,
                                    int max)
        Fills the file with the array of integers with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        rawFile - file in which the array of integers should appear
        number - amount of numbers in the array
        max - maximum number that can occur in the array

      • sort

        public static void sort(java.lang.String rawFile,
                        java.lang.String rawEncoding,
                        java.lang.String sortedFile)
        Sorts array from the rawFile and prints sorted variant to the sortedFile.
        Parameters:
        rawFile - file containing the unsorted array
        rawEncoding - encoding of the rawFile
        sortedFile - file in which the sorted array should appear

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Demonstrates results of work of the methods. Two new files appear after performing this method.
        Parameters:
        args - command line parameters
